DOC.brief_summary: About 10 % early pregnancy visualize transvaginal ultrasound ( TVU ) first visit classified pregnancy unknown location ( PUL ) . The etiology include ongoing intra-uterine pregnancy , fail pregnancy , ectopic pregnancy . Early diagnosis ectopic pregnancy important allow conservative treatment . Serum β-hCG , D & C , laparoscopy routinely use diagnostic method . The purpose study evaluate less invasive office hysteroscopy ( HSC ) help diagnose PUL .
DOC.detailed_description: If TVU show evidence intra-uterine extra-uterine pregnancy , blood test β-hCG do . If β-hCG < 1000 IU/L , woman follow β-hCG 2 day later . Women β-hCG > 1000 IU/L abnormal β-hCG trend ( increase < 66 % decrease < 15 % ) offer HSC . If gestational tissue visualize , ectopic pregnancy rule . Otherwise , tentative diagnosis ectopic pregnancy .
